Note.text: All stays in a hotel/apartment must pay 0.75 € per day per person if they stay in hotels of 1-2-3 stars 1.25 € per day per person if they stay in hotels of 4 stars and 2.5 € per day per person if they stay in 5 star hotels. This city tax is paid on check in/out directly to the hotel/apartment.
1x DOUBLE Estimated total amount of taxes & fees for this booking: 2.88 Euro payable on arrival.Car park NO. Check-in hour - .Cot on request

CancellationPolicy.text: Cancellation made less than 1 day (12:00) prior to the arrival will be charged with 100% of the total booking value.
